issue.title: [C++] RapidJSON triggers Wclass-memaccess on GCC 8+
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4750](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4750). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With GCC 8, we get build errors with RapidJSON due to `-Wclass-memaccess`. This is fixed in https://github.com/Tencent/rapidjson/pull/1323 . We should update our external project dependency to include this fix.
